fields.headline: Tickets to ride
fields.bodyText: Six top destinations New York: £232 Lufthansa from Heathrow via Frankfurt. Valid for travel until June 30. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Bridge the World (0870 4447474). Sydney: £529 Sri Lankan Airlines from Heathrow via Colombo, Valid for departures until July 10. No minimum stay, maximum three months. Quest Travel ( 0870 4445552). Hong Kong: £459 Cathay Pacific from Heathrow. Must be booked by June 25. Valid for departures September 1 - December 8. No minimum stay, maximum one month. Travelbag (0870 7377820). Los Angeles: £277 Lufthansa from Heathrow via Frankfurt. Valid for departures until June 30. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Thomas Cook Flights Direct (0870 7520066). Amsterdam: £78 KLM uk from Stansted. Valid for departures until December 31. No minimum stay, maximum one month. Trailfinders (020-79371234). Paris: £69 British Midland from Heathrow. Valid for departures until September 30. Travellers must by under 26 or full-time students with valid international student identification cards. usit Campus (0870 2401010). The pick of the rest Palma (Majorca) £79 Monarch Airlines charter from Gatwick. Departs June 26 for 10 nights. Avro (020 86954440). Orlando: £639 Combined price for two flying together on Virgin Atlantic from Manchester or Gatwick (same deal available Gatwick-Miami). Valid for departures except Saturdays until June 27. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Bon Voyage (0800 3160194). Melbourne: £544 Olympic Airways from Manchester via Athens. Valid for departures until March 31 next year. No minimum stay, maximum one year. Thomas Cook Flights Direct (0870 7520066). Auckland: £552 Japan Airlines from Heathrow via Tokyo. Valid for departures until July 13. No minimum stay, maximum one month. Overnight stay, included in price, required on homeward journey. Bridge the World (0870 4447474). And the rail alternative Marseille: £95 Eurostar from Waterloo or Ashford plus new high-speed TGV service (fare also valid to Valence, Aix en Provence, Avignon and onward points from Marseille including Nice, Cannes and Montpellier). Valid for departures until August 12. Must be booked at least one week before departure. Minimum stay one Saturday night, or two other nights.
